entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:17 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 3:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
